question: Based on the provided evidence, answer the following question: Which club did Josh Suggs play for around 2040?. If the evidence is insufficient to answer the question, return 'INSUFFICIENT_INFORMATION'.

content.source_1:
**Josh Suggs**

Josh Suggs is an American soccer player who currently plays for Colorado Springs Switchbacks FC, a professional soccer team based in Colorado Springs, Colorado. **Early Life and Career**

There is limited information available on Suggs' early life and career. However, according to his profile on the United Soccer League (USL) website, Suggs has been an integral part of the Colorado Springs Switchbacks FC team since 2019. [1]

**Club Career**

Suggs has been a consistent player for Colorado Springs Switchbacks FC, making numerous appearances for the team in the USL Championship. In the 2020 season, he played in 14 matches, scoring one goal and providing two assists. [2] His performances have been instrumental in the team's success, with Switchbacks FC finishing 5th in the Western Conference in 2020. [3]

**Current Team**

As of the 2022 season, Suggs continues to play for Colorado Springs Switchbacks FC. According to the team's official website, Suggs is listed as a midfielder on the current roster. [4]

**References**

[1] United Soccer League. (n.d.). Josh Suggs. Retrieved from <https:\/\/www.uslchampionship.com\/josh-suggs>

[2] Colorado Springs Switchbacks FC. (2020). 2020 Season Stats. Retrieved from <https:\/\/www.switchbacksfc.com\/stats\/2020\/>

[3] USL Championship. (2020). 2020 Standings. Retrieved from <https:\/\/www.uslchampionship.com\/standings\/2020>

[4] Colorado Springs Switchbacks FC. (2022). Roster. Retrieved from <https:\/\/www.switchbacksfc.com\/roster\/>

This Wikipedia entry provides comprehensive evidence to support the claim that Josh Suggs plays for Colorado Springs Switchbacks FC. The evidence includes references to credible sources such as the United Soccer League website, the Colorado Springs Switchbacks FC website, and the USL Championship website.
content.source_2: It's the year 2039, and the world of professional soccer has never been more electrifying. The stadiums are packed, the fans are frenzied, and the players are more skilled than ever before. Among them is Josh Suggs, a talented American soccer player who has just landed a coveted spot on the roster of Leyton Orient F.C., a storied association football club in London, England. As Josh steps onto the pitch at Brisbane Road, the Orient's home stadium, he can feel the weight of history beneath his feet. The club, founded in 1881, has a rich legacy of producing top-notch players and competing at the highest levels of English football. Josh is determined to make his mark and contribute to the team's success. The season is already in full swing, and Josh has been working tirelessly to get up to speed with his new teammates. The squad is a diverse and dynamic group, with players from all corners of the globe. There's Marcus, the seasoned goalkeeper from Brazil; Amara, the lightning-fast winger from Nigeria; and Jack, the rugged defender from Scotland. Together, they form a formidable unit, each player bringing their unique skills and strengths to the table. As Josh settles into his new routine, he begins to feel the rhythm of the game. He's been playing soccer since he was a kid, but this is different. This is the big leagues, and every match counts. The Orient is currently sitting in the middle of the table, but Josh is confident that they can make a push for promotion to the Championship, the second tier of English football. The days blend together in a blur of training sessions, team meetings, and matches. Josh's body aches from the constant physical demands of the sport, but his mind is razor-sharp, focused on the task at hand. He's learning to read the game, to anticipate the opposition's moves, and to make split-second decisions that can change the course of a match. As the weeks turn into months, Josh becomes an integral part of the Orient's starting lineup. He scores crucial goals, sets up his teammates with precision passes, and develops a reputation as a tenacious defender. The fans adore him, chanting his name and waving signs with his jersey number. But Josh knows that success is fleeting in the world of professional soccer. One bad game, one injury, and his spot on the team could be in jeopardy.
